Name: Statue of the Goddess Hathor
Description: Hathor, the symbolic mother of the pharaoh, is represented as a woman with the head of a cow. She wears her typical crown that consists of two cow horns, the sun disk, and two plumes. The sun disk indicates that Hathor was the daughter of the sun god Re. In her left hand, she probably held the sistrum, or rattle, her favorite musical instrument with which she drove away evil spirits.
